scenes.description: Performance of the song "Gira Gira" by Amane Kanata, featuring transitions with various Hololive members.
Omaru Polka performing "Po" in a circus-themed stage with dancing mascots.
Hakos Baelz performing "Play Dice!" in a futuristic, crystalline stage.
La+ Darknesss performing "Loveit" in a neon stage with multiple dancing clones.
Nakiri Ayame performing "Tada Koe Hitotsu" on a stage surrounded by water and giant cards.
Houshou Marine performing "Bishoujo Muzai♡Pirates" on a stage with floating umbrellas.

subtitles.original: 闇に紛れ　甘いトコに溶けて
subtitles.english: Blending into the darkness, melting into a sweet spot

subtitles.original: くたびれた鎖　繋いでは　ほどいて
subtitles.english: Connecting and unravelling tired chains

subtitles.original: 光の姿　化けて　瞳汚して
subtitles.english: Taking the form of light, tainting your eyes

subtitles.original: 鈍色の毒が　いたむのね
subtitles.english: The leaden poison is painful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ギラギラ　響かせてギラ
subtitles.english: Make it glitter, let it ring out, glitter

subtitles.original: ギラギラよ　ハッハッ
subtitles.english: Glittering, ha-ha

subtitles.original: とどかせてギラ　ギラギラ
subtitles.english: Make it reach, glitter, glitter

subtitles.original: 鳴らせよギラ　闇をとき放ちか
subtitles.english: Sound it out, glitter, release the darkness

subtitles.original: ヤムノカ　サキカ
subtitles.english: Will you fall ill, or will you bloom?

subtitles.original: 噛みつきはしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't bite you

subtitles.original: なぐさめもしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't comfort you either

subtitles.original: 私のものになれ
subtitles.english: Become mine

subtitles.original: 飽きたら　のり捨て
subtitles.english: I'll discard you once I'm bored

subtitles.original: ポポポポポポポポ
subtitles.english: Po po po po po po po po

subtitles.original: ネネネネネネネネ
subtitles.english: Ne ne ne ne ne ne ne ne

subtitles.original: ポポネネネネポポ
subtitles.english: Po po ne ne ne ne po po

subtitles.original: Baby, hold your light. Are you living free?
subtitles.english: Baby, hold your light. Are you living free?

subtitles.original: Let’s forget everything and have some fun!
subtitles.english: Let’s forget everything and have some fun!

subtitles.original: Give you all a sweet surprise, hear me testify
subtitles.english: Give you all a sweet surprise, hear me testify

subtitles.original: Baby, Baby, Destiny Nothing's Ordinary
subtitles.english: Baby, Baby, Destiny Nothing's Ordinary

subtitles.original: Give it all, give it heart, give it all for life
subtitles.english: Give it all, give it heart, give it all for life

subtitles.original: Keep on giving in, go show them your best try
subtitles.english: Keep on giving in, go show them your best try

subtitles.original: Once you've start, there is no more going back
subtitles.english: Once you've start, there is no more going back

subtitles.original: What you doing, Rat? Show them all your luck!
subtitles.english: What you doing, Rat? Show them all your luck!

subtitles.original: Hear me out, baby! Baby don't care
subtitles.english: Hear me out, baby! Baby don't care

subtitles.original: Hear me out, baby! Baby don't care
subtitles.english: Hear me out, baby! Baby don't care

subtitles.original: Hear me out, baby! Baby don't care
subtitles.english: Hear me out, baby! Baby don't care

subtitles.original: Hear me out, baby!
subtitles.english: Hear me out, baby!

subtitles.original: Now sing it baby
subtitles.english: Now sing it baby

subtitles.original: ラブラブラブラブラ
subtitles.english: Love love love love love

subtitles.original: ラブラブラブラブラ
subtitles.english: Love love love love love

subtitles.original: ラブラブラブラブラ
subtitles.english: Love love love love love

subtitles.english: LOVE, HATE, OR THE SAME? IF YOU KNOW, PLAY THE GAME

subtitles.original: I’M LACK OF POP AND PSYCH-OUT,
subtitles.english: I’M LACK OF POP AND PSYCH-OUT,

subtitles.original: I CAN’T WIPE OUT THE FINGER ON THE WATER
subtitles.english: I CAN’T WIPE OUT THE FINGER ON THE WATER

subtitles.original: LOVE, HATE, OR THE SAME? IF YOU KNOW, PLAY THE GAME
subtitles.english: LOVE, HATE, OR THE SAME? IF YOU KNOW, PLAY THE GAME

subtitles.original: HELP ME OUT, DECIDE IF YOU WANT ME TO SHUT THE LINE
subtitles.english: HELP ME OUT, DECIDE IF YOU WANT ME TO SHUT THE LINE

subtitles.original: LOVE IS JUST A GIVE-IT-UP GAME,
subtitles.english: LOVE IS JUST a GIVE-IT-UP GAME,

subtitles.english: LOVE HATE IS a SAME BALL

subtitles.original: Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: ただただ回れ　黙り黙り前を
subtitles.english: Just keep spinning, silently looking ahead

subtitles.original: 言えないね　そんな強い言葉は
subtitles.english: I can't say it, such strong words

subtitles.original: 少しだけ静かにしてほしいね
subtitles.english: I want you to be a little quiet

subtitles.original: 私たち退避網
subtitles.english: The two of us are contrasting

subtitles.original: 今の今みたいなはずだったのに
subtitles.english: It was supposed to be just like now

subtitles.original: セカイ点々点　ボクヤヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: World dot-dot-dot, I am...

subtitles.original: 見やるその日までは　ソトトトトト
subtitles.english: Until the day I see it...

subtitles.original: イェイ　今夜の事には
subtitles.english: Yei, tonight's matter is...

subtitles.original: 街点々点チャチャチャ　あなたの街中
subtitles.english: City dot-dot-dot, cha cha cha, in your city

subtitles.original: 建て直すわ　バテサ
subtitles.english: I'll rebuild it...

subtitles.original: 点々々々　ボクヤヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: Dot-dot-dot-dot, I am...

subtitles.original: 果たすその日まで　レレレトトト
subtitles.english: Until the day it's fulfilled...

subtitles.original: 点点々々々々々
subtitles.english: Dot-dot-dot-dot...

subtitles.original: FUSAE! LELIA! FEE!
subtitles.english: FUSAE! LELIA! FEE!

subtitles.original: ZETA! BILKYO! DEFIS!
subtitles.english: ZETA! BILKYO! DEFIS!

subtitles.original: 海が揺れる夜　波に映った星
subtitles.english: Stars reflected in the waves on a night when the sea sways

subtitles.original: 光った月が
subtitles.english: The shining moon...
